segments.text: Can you believe that Obama is our new President ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m so happy about that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I sure did . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have complete confidence in our new President .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know he will help change America .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope so , because America needs a change .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I feel like things are already changing , because he was elected .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m not worried about our country now that it ’ s in his hands .
segments.speaker: S2
